info.description:
******************
blacklotus.garnish
******************

This package adds garnishes to the Black Lotus series of websites by
standardizing on a certain set of links, actions, boilerplate, etc.

It can be used on any Plone_ site, of course, or as an example of a Plone_
add-on.

.. _Plone: http://plone.org/


Installation
============

Use Buildout with the plone.recipe.zope2instance recipe.

• Add ``blacklotus.garnish`` to the list of eggs to install, e.g.::

    [buildout]
    ...
    eggs =
        ...
        plonetheme.sunburst

  Alternatively, include ``blacklotus.garnish`` as a dependency of another
  package.

• Re-run buildout, e.g. with::
  
    $ ./bin/buildout
        
You don't need to list a ZCML slug because ``blacklotus.garnish`` lists a
``z3c.autoinclude.plugin`` target for Plone.



Changelog
=========

This document tracks changes from release to release.

1.0.1 — Missing Files
---------------------

Zope Page Templates (.pt) files were inadvertently left out of the last release;
this release includes them.


1.0.0 — Initial
---------------

First customer ship.


0.0.0 — Unreleased
------------------

This release hasn't even been released. Mind = blown.
